item.content:encoded:
Here is the details changelog of the Doxy Jekyll Template

V2.0.0 (28 Mar, 2019)

** Facebook Open Graph Meta Data added in Layout
** Twitter Card Meta Data added in Layout
** Author Image Source Linking bug fixed
** Doc Page's Sidebar Menu Accordion bug Fixed

V1.0.0 (13 Feb, 2019)

Initial Release
 Still st

item.title: Writing Blog Post
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: To create a new post in Doxy Jekyll Theme blog area, you should create a new markdown (.md) file inside the _posts directory or folder. Here following a post example with different configurations for a blog post page. --- layout: post title: "Blog Post Title" date: 2019-02-15 18:51:30 +0600 tags: [jekyll, update] post_image: https://placehold.it/500x600 comment: […]
item.content:encoded:
To create a new post in Doxy Jekyll Theme blog area, you should create a new markdown (.md) file inside the _posts directory or folder.  Here following a post example with different configurations for a blog post page.

---
layout: post
title:  "Blog Post Title"
date:   2019-02-15 18:51:30 +0600
tags: [jekyll, update]
post_image: https://placehold.it/500x600
comment: true
author_url: https://themeix.com
author_designation: Ux/Ui Designer
author_bio: Wrute bio for post author
---
view raw2019-02-15-welcome-to-jekyll.md hosted with by GitHub

Change Post Sidebar Position

You can easily change your sidebar position from the post layout option.

There are 2 post layout available in that theme. Use post_left for left sidebar and use only post for right sidebar layout

item.title: Theme Layouts
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: This theme comes with 8 different layouts and styles for the inner pages. default.html doc.html doc_full.html doc_right.html page.html post.html post_left.html tag_page.html For the doc page you will find 3 different layout where you can change the sidebar position left to right and also you can rid the sidebar completely from doc pages. There have 2 […]
item.content:encoded:
This theme comes with 8 different layouts and styles for the inner pages.

  • default.html
  • doc.html
  • doc_full.html
  • doc_right.html
  • page.html
  • post.html
  • post_left.html
  • tag_page.html

For the doc page you will find 3 different layout where you can change the sidebar position left to right and also you can rid the sidebar completely from doc pages. There have 2 differents sidbear position layout for blog post.

item.title: Deployment
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: To run our the jekyll theme locally, navigate to the theme directory from your PC and run bundle install command in git client app. to install the dependencies, then run bundle exec jekyll serve to start the Jekyll server. Here following some good resources to deploy jekyll : Manual Deployment Automated Deployment (Example: Travis CI, Circle CI, Buddy etc) 3rd […]
item.content:encoded:
To run our the jekyll theme locally, navigate to the theme directory from your PC and run bundle install command in git client app. to install the dependencies, then run bundle exec jekyll serve to start the Jekyll server.

Here following some good resources to deploy jekyll :

  • Manual Deployment
  • Automated Deployment (Example: Travis CI, Circle CI, Buddy etc)
  • 3rd Party Deployment  (Example : Aerobatic, CloudCannon, Github Pages, Kickster, Netlify, Static Publisher)

item.title: Doxy Configurations & Settings
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: Doxy themes comes with various customizations in the _config.yml file
item.content:encoded: Doxy themes comes with various customizations in the _config.yml file

item.title: Doxy Jekyll Introduction
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: Doxy Jekyll is a multipurpose Jekyll theme to create an outstanding documentation website or support portal. You will get a clean, polished and modern website with Doxy Jekyll Theme. It’s a ready website template for your support portal solution. Doxy Jekyll built with Jekyll Static Site Generator Framework. This theme as all necessary features for […]
item.content:encoded:
Doxy Jekyll is a multipurpose Jekyll theme to create an outstanding documentation website or support portal.  You will get a clean, polished and modern website with Doxy Jekyll Theme. It’s a ready website template for your support portal solution.

Doxy Jekyll built with  Jekyll Static Site Generator Framework. This theme as all necessary features for a support portal website. You will get tons of features and pages in that theme.  This theme has working Submit Ticket, Contact Form and Automatic Dorp Down menu features.
